title: unakku iNai neeyE
sahitya:
unakkiNai nIyE bhAratat tAyE

tanakkuv amai illA tavashIlarait tanda  

anupallavi  

tanit tanmaiyE unadu tattuvamE

anaittulagum viyanda samatuvamE kaNDa  

madhyama kAla caraNam  

aDimai iruL enum koDumai aganRu aruNOdayam kaNDa nALiduvE

keDu madiyALarin sancalanATaka sUzhcci tanai venRa nADiDuvE

ahimsai enum ara neRiyE adarkkIDu iNai Edum illaiyE eRra mahA mandiram tanaiyE

tanda mahAn gAndiyai InRa annaiyE
